H0.text: In the Old Testament of the Bible who was the father of David. Abraham

H1.text: In the Old Testament of the Bible who was the father of David. Isaac

H2.text: In the Old Testament of the Bible who was the father of David. Jacob

H3.text: In the Old Testament of the Bible who was the father of David. Jesse

A4.text: Jesse ( JESS-ee) or Yishai is a figure described in the Hebrew Bible as the father of David
